professionalExperience.title: Technical Lead - Growth Team

Started a Product-Led Growth engineering team to create & support a more comprehensive Free & 14-day Free Trial experience on top of Pendo's platform, as well as coordinating & running UX experiments to increase Pendo Free customer's retention & vitality
